apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  name: authorizedkeys
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: authkeys
    spec:
      volumes:
        - name: rootfs
          hostPath:
            path: /root
            type: Directory
      containers:
      - name: authorizedkeys
        image: IMAGE_NAME
        volumeMounts:
          - name: rootfs
            mountPath: /user
            readOnly: false
        env:
        - name: AUTHORIZED_KEYS
          value: "SSH_KEY"
